desc: Effic Business Services Pvt. Ltd.  Is hiring centers to manage Seller Acquisition and Onboarding operations for e-commerceMarketplace covering the following set of activities. The scope of work involves invitingqualified sellers (manufacturers, dealers, distributors, retailers) across various verticalsto participate with our reputed e-commerce marketplace and assist seller's to list aminimum of 25 products to the e-Commerce platform and go live.FOS Operations will involve the following:1.1. Lead Generation + Seller Onboarding: The Vendor has to identify the sellersbasis the requirement specified by e-commerce marketplacea. Specified Vertical and Category with specified attribute selection that issharedb.  Generate the Lead from the required verticals and facilitate seller go liveC. Ensuring that the seller is bringing in the required number of listings asdefined for that verticale. Onboard the seller by assisting them on the following aspectsi. Registration on Seller Portalii. Uploading the required documentsiii. Assisting in cataloging and listingiv. Assisting in Stock update and pricingv. Order Management System2. Center profile: The center should have FOS agents who are skilled to handle theacquisition and onboarding of new sellers to the Marketplace, by interacting with thesellers face to face and through various channels of communication and assisting thesellers on various aspects of the Marketplace platform. FOS Consultants should have thebasic skills to use a computer/laptop with basic usage of MS Excel, Internet and typingskills. Their skills should also include the ability to persuade and convince sellers tocome on board. Consultants to be able to speak English and Hindi fluently. Fluency inregional language will be required based on the zone that the Consultant is working on.3. Infrastructure:a. All Hardware including laptop, broadband, WiFi, internet dongle, Software (including MSExcel) for training the Sellers or for any administrative/other purposes need to be providedby Centers to their FOS Consultants and will not be billable to Efficb. CRM access will be provided by Efficc. Physical work facility for the FOS Consultants to be provided by the Center4. Approach: FOS will support bringing in the right selection on to the Marketplace byfollowing up on your own leads or the leads shared by Effic, go out into the market andonboard sellers from required verticals and zones and onboard them to marketplace.Effic will share a list of focused verticals along with the required number of listings pervertical.
title: e-commerce seller on boarding project

All Articles must relevant & Unique content + images (Copy Scape passed)6. Keywords Density would around minimum 5 keywords, could be a little bit more but don't over, keep the indicator of Yoast stay green.7. Blast the written Articles link to High TrustFlow websites (minimum 20 TF) with good Domain Authority (minimum DA 30). I prefer quality backlinks not spamming backlinks.If you could do multi tier link building would be better.Keywords link to the Articles links (Example 'website traffic' keyword when clicked it would goes to Article about Website Traffic on my website)Please let me know how many Backlinks you could provide me with your bidding price.I will prefer and only consider the best offer of amount and price.8. All the websites link must contain low OBL, DOFOLLOW and Permanent.If you had PBN network, it would be better.Please avoid Profiles Backlinks, Comment Backlinks submission.9. You must indexed All the created links after submission.10. I need detail reports of all the link submission for manual check.Please make sure that you know how to write a good quality contents and how to create a great offsite seo linkbuilding before you bid.I prefer to consider bidders that had any past example of the similar work.Looking forward to hear from you.Thanks alot.Kind regards,Xen
